item.title: Updating Sharepoint Online List With Powershell the Easy Way
item.author: contact@saggiehaim.net (Saggie Haim)
item.description: Hey Guys! It’s been a long time since my last post, as I been busy with work trips. But now I’m back! And I want to share with you my experience with PowerShell and SharePoint Online. To be honest, I never worked with SharePoint before. I got a request from the SharePoint team to update a list weekly from a CSV report that HR provides (Weekly employees birthdays, nothing exciting).
